sense.def:
Comfort
je telesna ali duševna sproščenost.

seg.quote: She longed to stretch out in comfort.
...a hard narrow chair not made for comfort.
I found comfort in his words.

sense.def:
Prijeten življenjski slog, pri katerem imamo vse, kar potrebujemo, lahko imenujemo
comfort
.

seg.quote: She wanted a life of reasonable comfort.

sense.def:
Comforts
so stvari, ki življenje naredijo prijetnejše ali poskrbijo, da nismo več v skrbeh.

seg.quote: It will be a comfort to know that you are standing by.
I longed for the comforts of home.

sense.def:
To comfort someone
pomeni poskrbeti, da se nekdo počuti manj zaskrbljenega ali nesrečnega.

seg.quote: It's a comforting thought that we have a few days before it starts.
